name: ite-camp
body:
## Welcome!
This is a webpage for attendees of UVa's Introduction to Engineering (ITE) camp.  I'm leading the design project and competition; this webpage will give links, tutorials, downloads, etc, relevant to this portion of the camp.

### Monday, June 22

**Building Instructions:** [click here](http://www.education.rec.ri.cmu.edu/content/lego/building/build_shows/rem.pdf).  
**Programming Handout:** [click here](https://github.com/apnorton/ite-camp/raw/master/MondayHandout.pdf).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
